text: Clafasio Dias is an Indian politician of the Bharatiya Janata Party who represents Cuncolim in Goa Legislative Assembly. He won by Defeating Sitting MLA Rajan Naik of BJP and Ex MLA Joaquim Alemao of Independent.He was Zilla Panchayat Member, Sarpanch and Chairperson of South Goa Zilla Panchayat. He was one of the ten members of Indian National Congress who joined Bharatiya Janata Party in July 2019.10 former Goa Congress MLAs, who joined BJP, reach Delhi to meet Amit ShahIn fresh jolt to Congress in Goa, 10 party legislators switch to BJP He is being appointed as a Chairperson of Mormugao Planning Development Authority (MPDA). ==Personal life== Clafasio Dias is Married to Seema Dias. She was Zilla Panchayat {ZP} Member which earlier Clafasio represented. she is the owner of Jolly Constructions which undertakes PWD Contracts on Roads. Clafasio and Seema are blessed with 3 Sons ==References== Category:Living people Category:Indian National Congress politicians from Goa Category:Goa MLAs 2017– Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Goa
title: Clafasio Dias
